data.title: Makalah B. Inggris Kelompok 13
data.meta_description: MAKALAH B. INGGRIS KELOMPOK 13 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an analysis of the Indonesian film "Sang Pencerah". It summarizes the plot, which follows the life of Ahmad Dahlan and his struggles to reform Islamic teachings in Kauman village during the 1800s. It discusses how Ahmad Dahlan founded the Muhammadiyah Islamic organization after returning from studying in Mecca. The film was directed by Hanung Bramantyo and stars Lukman Sardi as Ahmad Dahlan. It aims to portray Ahmad Dahlan's nationalism and efforts to promote a true understanding of Islam through religious propagation activities.
